projects.name: Doge To Mars
projects.summary: Sequel to my 25k-download hit, embraced by the Dogecoin community
projects.description: Follow-up to Dogecoin To The Moon. Received extremely positive reception from the Dogecoin community, leading to a competitive scholarship invitation to the Dogecoin Hackathon (June 2025).

projects.name: Dogecoin To The Moon
projects.summary: Crypto-themed mobile game with organic viral growth
projects.description: Mobile game targeting the Dogecoin community with NFT integration. Achieved 25,000 organic downloads with a 4.9-star rating — no marketing budget. Early example of successful crypto-gaming convergence.

projects.name: Rody & Mastico Collection
projects.summary: Remastered Atari ST series with integrated level editor
projects.description: 3+ years of development recreating classic Atari ST games. Features Rody Maker, a full level editor allowing players to create and share custom stories. Collaborated with French YouTubers for launch, gaining significant exposure.

projects.name: Unity CI/CD Template
projects.summary: Complete automation pipeline for Unity mobile games
projects.description: Production-ready template automating Unity builds for Android (AAB → Play Store) and iOS (IPA → TestFlight) using GameCI and Fastlane. Includes Firebase distribution for beta testing.

projects.name: Sorolla Palette SDK
projects.summary: Zero-config mobile publisher SDK for Unity games
projects.description: Unity Package Manager SDK for mobile game publishing. Features automatic iOS ATT handling, ad network integration, and analytics setup with minimal configuration required.

projects.name: Facebook SDK for UPM
projects.summary: Facebook SDK repackaged for Unity Package Manager
projects.description: Clean UPM-compatible package of the Facebook SDK for easier integration into Unity projects via Package Manager instead of manual import.

projects.name: Happy Snake 3D
projects.summary: Three.js playable ad game for Sorolla's publishing pipeline
projects.description: Self-contained single-file HTML playable ad built with Three.js. Features a full 3D snake game with joystick controls, particles, and an end card CTA. Architecture serves as a reusable template for future playable ad production.

projects.name: The Binding of Euclide
projects.description: A roguelike inspired by The Binding of Isaac but with geometric shapes and math-themed mechanics. Built for a game jam.

projects.name: The Plot Hole: Little Red
projects.summary: Narrative game jam entry — team of 4
projects.description: Story-driven game created during a game jam with a team of 4 developers. Explores the concept of plot holes in fairy tales.

projects.name: Univeria
projects.description: Puzzle game exploring the scale of the universe, from atoms to galaxies.

projects.name: Vampire Survivor Clone
projects.description: Vampire Survivors-style game created as teaching material for my Unity courses at Futurae school. Used to teach 20 students (ages 20-22) game development fundamentals.

projects.name: Sci-Fi Tower Defense
projects.description: Sci-fi themed tower defense game built as a teaching resource for Unity courses, demonstrating game architecture patterns.

projects.name: Genetic Algorithm Pathfinder
projects.description: C++ implementation of a genetic algorithm finding shortest paths on 2D maps with obstacles. Features distributed island model for parallel evolution. Master's degree project.
